1323670.name: Bit Bamboo
1323670.description:
Save the village of Hokkaido. The local botanist has grown ill and they need your help to grow bamboo.

Research new strains and purchase root ties to apply them. Take active care of your bamboo. Head to the waters edge and keep the soil moist. Enjoy the simple but elegant environment. Watch the birds fly by and the fish swim. And take cover during rainstorms.

Key Features


  • Non-linear progression
  • Retro soundtrack
  • Pixel art in 4x3 aspect ratio
